@@ -169,0 +169,8 @@
+#ifdef DEBUG
+        // The destructor of a static object is called at process shutdown or dll
+        // unloading. The JVM is not available for the raw monitors at that time,
+        // so we need to stop locking before continuing.
+        DTrace_DisableMutex();
+        DMem_DisableMutex();
+#endif
+
